reviews.title: hotel with a view
reviews.text: I picked this hotel because of the location, it overlooks the old town and if you get a green wing room you will have a perfect view of the old town. There are blue and green wings, green is a bit more expensive but its got a nice view. The hotel is adjacent to the railway station and there are some restaurants within the complex. Very simply furnished but comfortable enough for short stays.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Popped into Go Hotel Shnelli in Tallinn few weeks ago and we were positively surprised! Did not book in advance, but hey, its the offseason in Tallinn now, so it´s easy to get a room. GO hotel seems to be new and the prices are excellent, specially considering the location in the center. We got a room with the view towards the old town and the park, really great! Do reccommend to everybody who do not require anything too fancy but appreciate clean and central accommodation!
reviews.title: truly affordable hotel in the center of Tallinn

reviews.text: Hotel room was 79 euros/night at the beginning of June, which is high-season so the price was definitely not bad. It was a very basic, yet clean hotel in a great location (could see the walls of the old city out my window), only 5 minutes to the old city. Only stayed one night and I had no complaints. Breakfast was included and it had good basics (tea/coffee, bread, veggies, eggs, potatoes and danishes). If you are on a budget, stay here...great value!
reviews.title: Great Value, Excellent Location
New, cheap, clean and great value
reviews.text: The GoSchnelli is a new hotel in Tallinn. It's situated adjacent to the main railway station and directly opposite the old town - about 5 minutes walk.
